content:
I want to make some performance measurement on hapi.
I was wondering if it is possible to kind of dump the http://hapi.fhir.org/ database
then restore it on my server.
I want to know if it is possible to use hapi directly as a datasource and avoid to have an internal structure then mapping it to hapi.
Thank you very much ! :)

Is there a reason you couldn't just use Synthea to generate as much synthetic data as you need?

Technically you could certainly use Bulk Export to grab everything in hapi.fhir.org, but that does create a big performance hit on the server and affects other users so it's certainly kinder if you just use Synthea :)
